skills.name: Headbutt
skills.description: Attacks with the horns and provokes for 1 turn with a 50% chance. The provoke effect is guaranteed if the attack lands as a Critical Hit.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.name: Slaughter
skills.description: Attacks with an axe and recovers 20% HP. Additionally, if the enemy dies by this attack, your HP is recovered by 25% of the enemy's MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.name: Exile (Passive)
skills.description: Increases your Attack Power by 100% and your Attack Power increases additionally as your HP decreases. You won't be able to receive any beneficial effects during battle. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
